name: The Awakening of the Keeper
description:
A student project my team and I did for the first time in about two and a half months. We had some technical difficulties along the way but I think it turned out pretty well anyway, considered it was out first time doing... well... everything, really.

Summary:

You are the Guardian of a temple under your God's protection and you're being awakened from your slumber to search for the source of the corruption that keeps spreading and tainting this sacred place.

Controls:
Movement: WASD/Arrow Keys
Confirm/Jump: Space
Attack: Q
